samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This example describes key features of JavaScript textarea such as a input group, placeholder, validation states, and more.

samples.name: Floating Label
samples.description: This example exposes the floating behaviour of the placeholder respective to the selected floatLabelType option from the property panel in JavaScript textarea.

samples.name: Resize
samples.description: This example exposes the resizing behaviour respective to the selected resizeMode option from the property panel in the JavaScript textarea.

samples.name: Adornments
samples.description: The example exposes a JavaScript textarea with adornments support. It helps to render custom elements before or after the textarea element.

samples.name: API
samples.description: This example exposes the API functionalities used to customize the appearance and behavior of the JavaScript textarea.
